programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5146
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep59
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep60
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go Ep3217
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan Ep44
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream Ep76
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan. 5

programme.title: Girls Tease Ep14
programme.desc: This show focuses on the issues that are most important to urban modern women. It combines current events with discussions of life's major and minor problems and invites various specialists to address various difficulties. Netizens will occasionally attend the show to share their own stories and ask questions of the guests and experts, making the topics more relevant and audience-focused!

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep678
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz Ep1062
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Just for You Ep10
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: The story is based on a 1993 true event, the "China-Russia Train Robbery" where a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman heads the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2012
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-retired weather presenter Kwok Ching has always dream of becoming a news anchor. Being a single parent, he interferes in every aspect of his childrens lives, causing them to move away from him. When Kwok Ching receives a doomsday news and finally has the chance to become a news anchor, it is also time to reunite with his family.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Xiao Fei is a cheerful girl who has been abandoned by her mother. One day, she encounters a gifted young man named Zi Wai, who is battling a rare disease. Determined to help him, she embarks on a journey to find his lost love. Even when they discover that the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu skill from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in a fight between the Qing and Ming camps along the way, and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep37
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep37
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep38

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Miss Marple: Nemesis (Part 2) - Miss Marple and her nephew, novelist Raymond West, embark on a coach tour of historic English houses with an eclectic group of characters at the behest of a late friend who had knowledge of an unsolved murder.

programme.title: ALF S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Keepin' The Faith - In order to help out with the Tanner family's finances, ALF takes a job selling cosmetics over the phone.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Angel On The Line - Mary and her very attractive friend, Lois, go to the Hot Line Club, a singles club with a phone at each table. The phone rings and the caller asks to speak to Lois.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep01
programme.desc: A Dinner For Harry - It is Harry's birthday, and the Jeffersons have invited him and the Willises over for a dinner party. But the occasion turns sour when Tom shows up wearing the same tuxedo as George, causing George to become jealous.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep02
programme.desc: George's First Vacation - George and Louise decide to take a cruise for their first-ever vacation, but then have to figure out how to tell Mother Jefferson that she's not invited.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 Ep14
programme.desc: Killer Radio - While on a Midwest book tour, Jessica discovers numerous suspects when she investigates the mysterious murder of a local radio station owner.

programme.title: Bewitched S5 Ep24
programme.desc: The Battle Of Burning Oak - When Darrin joins an exclusive club, Endora turns him into a snob.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S5 Ep21
programme.desc: Help, Help! A Shark - With a little help from Jeannie, a score is "evened" between Tony and General Schaeffer.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 Ep08
programme.desc: The Deadly Replay - Steve is determined to be the test pilot in the rebuilt version of the aircraft in which he had his accident.

programme.title: Bewitched S5 Ep25
programme.desc: Samantha's Power Failure - Refusing to obey the Witches' Council and give up Darrin, Samantha loses her magical powers.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S5 Ep22
programme.desc: Eternally Yours, Jeannie - Tony has an unexpected reunion with his childhood sweetheart and his adulthood wife.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 Ep15
programme.desc: The Petrified Florist - While observing the guests at a dinner party held by a Beverly Hills gossip magazine editor, Jessica envisions the plot for her next murder mystery.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Live Bait - The Impossible Missions Force invades the intricate world of spies to protect an American double agent and comes up against a human time bomb.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 Ep01
programme.desc: A Pocket Full of Rye (Part 1) - A businessman is murdered while at work, and a handful of rye is found in his pockets. Soon after, members of his household fall victim to a killer intent on recreating scenes from a popular nursery rhyme.

programme.title: ALF S1 Ep01
programme.desc: A.L.F. (Pilot) - Willie Tanner's peaceful life is disrupted when a bedraggled space creature ALF (Alien Life Form) by the Tanner children crashes into the roof of his garage and takes up residence in the Tanners' suburban home.

programme.title: ALF S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Strangers In The Night - When Willie and Kate leave ALF and Brian at home with a baby-sitter, nosey Mrs. Ochmonek, ALF can't resist having some fun with the nervous woman.

programme.title: ALF S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Looking For Lucky - When Lucky, the Tanner family's cat, disappears, everyone is sure ALF has eaten him. To prove his innocence, ALF searches for Lucky and winds up in the local dog pound.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 Ep04
programme.desc: The Pal-Mir Escort - Steve must escort a dying prime minister to a secret hospital to protect her from assassins.

programme.title: The Six Million Dollar Man S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Seven Million Dollar Man - Another bionic man is created, even more powerful than Steve, but he is mentally unstable.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S3 Ep14
programme.desc: The Test Case - The IMF must end the murderous career of a bacteriologist working for the enemy who has succeeded in developing a mutant strain of a deadly bacteria which could be used as a practical battlefield weapon.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S3 Ep15
programme.desc: The System - The Impossible Missions Force, led by Jim Phelps, sets out to persuade the trusted henchman of a crime syndicate leader to testify against his boss.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S3 Ep16
programme.desc: The Glass Cage - An electronically guarded prison confronts the Impossible Missions Force when it tries to free a political prisoner from an escape-proof glass cell.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 Ep07
programme.desc: Hula Angels - Steve Moss, owner of the Tropicana nightclub in Honolulu, is kidnapped, after firing young dancer, Donna Lindsey. He is taken in a van to a warehouse, where he is put into a cage with 60's rock music blaring in his ears.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 Ep08
programme.desc: Moonshinin' Angels - The Angels are sent to Moonshine country in the Deep South to investigate problems between long-feuding bootlegging families, the Bartletts and the Catlins.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Geoge's Skeleton - George's old friend, Monk Davis, pays him a visit, demanding hush money George has been paying him for years to keep a crime the two committed a secret from Louise and Lionel.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Lionel Cries Uncle - Louise's Uncle Ward visits the Jeffersons, but George derisively refers to him as an "Uncle Tom" for having worked as a butler for many years.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 Ep08
programme.desc: Mother Jefferson's Boyfriend - Louise tells George that his mother and her boyfriend of two weeks are thinking about marrying and moving to Florida. George thinks that the man is a fortune-hunter to get George's money.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 Ep09
programme.desc: Meet The Press - George learns that a reporter is planning a series of articles on successful African-American businessmen, but his decision to invite the reporter to a party backfires when the reporter finds far more interesting subjects.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 Ep11
programme.desc: Final Curtain - When Seth's (William Windom) old friend (Peter Donat), an actor coming out of retirement, returns to Cabot Cove to work on a play, he confronts ghosts from his past and a murder.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S9 Ep12
programme.desc: Double Jeopardy - One of Jessica's students is framed for murder when someone uses information from her creative writing class to kill a local crime boss.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Towards Zero (Part 1) - A wealthy woman holds a party at her Devon estate for family and friends. When a solicitor and the hostess herself are both murdered, Miss Marple tries to find a clever killer with a devious plan.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S3 Ep06
programme.desc: Towards Zero (Part 2) - A wealthy woman holds a party at her Devon estate for family and friends. When a solicitor and the hostess herself are both murdered, Miss Marple tries to find a clever killer with a devious plan.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S5 Ep18
programme.desc: Mrs. Djinn Djinn - When Roger spreads the news that the stork is to visit the Nelson household, he doesn't know that Mrs. Djinn-Djinn, the genie dog, is the object of the visit -- not Jeannie.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S5 Ep19
programme.desc: Jeannie And The Curious Kid - Curiosity captures Jeannie, Tony and Roger bring her back.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winstons world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sammi, Rose, and Casey - Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bandit, Max, and George - Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to surviveand if they dont, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Stinkers - In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep1

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Insect Apocalypse - Look at what a global insect decline could do to our planet. Uncover our historical dependence on these tiny animals, the vital roles they play in our ecosystems, and the reasons why our fragile relationship to them is in danger worldwide.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moths clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaires fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yaras kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Winged Weirdos - One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Garden Route - In a park where land meets sea, the natural elements combine to create wonderful variety. Cola-colored water feeds forests green and dense. Fire and wind fuel growth in great diversity and rock shapes a coastline of many faces. Life thrives here - from the magnificent to the bizarre. This is the Garden Route National Park.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Life Begins - For the first few weeks of life, the world is a frightening place. Danger lurks around every corner. It pays to be alert. Whether predator or prey. Any day might be your last. The race is on to grow up fast- for even the largest animals are vulnerable to attack.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life's Lessons - If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life's Legacies - For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animals legacy. But its not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwas mating game.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Life Among Trees - How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And whats it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to surviveand if they dont, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Seasonal Shores - Strap in for a thrilling ride as Lizzie travels by air, land, and sea to meet Alaskan wildlife and visit the worlds remotest corners. Eavesdrop on underwater Arctic residents with scientists, dine with polar bears, and scavenge with bald eagles.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wild West - Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Jamie: Fast and Simple S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a trusty midweek traybake of roast veg and Camembert. He turns poached chicken into a creamy chicken & chive pie, serves up his easy green chilli salsa under sizzling butterflied prawns, and finishes it all off with decadent chocolate tiramis.

programme.title: Jamie: Fast and Simple S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie shares a simple salmon dish perfect for a midweek meal, and some no-fuss fish cakes made from tins. He cooks a lamb Madras traybake, as well as a no-cook pasta sauce, and crowns it all off with a hot and crispy ice cream parcel!

programme.title: Jamie: Fast and Simple S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a speedy jarred-pepper pasta, crispy chicken in baked-bread sauce, and a beef brisket traybake - all prepped in minutes. He makes shelf-raid spiced haricot beans, and rounds it all off with a fast and simple strawberry & balsamic tart.

programme.title: Jamie: Fast and Simple S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a midweek meal of speedy Sweet pea chicken, a juicy Smash burger and a chicken and mushroom rice traybake. He batch-cooks his seven-veg sauce, followed by a spicy fish soup. And finishes off with a perfect pudding of tinned fruit granita.

programme.title: Old Taste Detective S4 Ep8
programme.desc: Delicacies change over time and may differ from the original version.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep21
programme.desc: She Said, She Said / Starfish - When one of Rikkis plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep22
programme.desc: Leroys Caterpillar / Lost Spark - Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep47
programme.desc: Lucky and the Warm Welcome - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep48
programme.desc: Lucky and the Dressage Sabotage - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep47
programme.desc: Titan Up - When the Orphans start rumors that Puss has special powers, Taranis the God of Thunder asks Puss to help defeat the most powerful God of all, Toutatis

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep48
programme.desc: Boar Games - When Roz the boar comes to San Lorenzo to collect a bounty for capturing Puss, Pajuna tries to keep them separated before an epic fight breaks out

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep24
programme.desc: Superfan / Barb - Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep7
programme.desc: Remote Control - Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what hes been missing real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldnt be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eeps traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isnt until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes its time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep20
programme.desc: Please Hold While We Connect You - In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy. Feeling responsible, Yi embarks on a dangerous mission to save everyone but its the community of creatures and humans alike that instead come to Yis rescue. Together, they realize that their connections to one another are the most powerful magic of all.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep11
programme.desc: Angerdome / Tush Twins - Tip battles an alien as angry as she is at the Boov's Angerspringa festival./Sharzod and Lucy become besties and call themselves the Tush Twins.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep11
programme.desc: Cruise Control / R/C Turbo - The snails are invited to perform on a cruise ship and while onboard Turbo encounters a group of rodent pirates who challenge him to a raceloser has to walk the plank/When Turbo is knocked out before a big charity race, Skidmark creates a shell that allows the crew to race the unconscious Turbo with a remote control.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep32
programme.desc: Blayde - Dozer and the crew must find a way to outsmart a clever bully named Blayde, a new ememy who kidnapped George and destroyed the Dozeratop mounds

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep33
programme.desc: Mouse Hunt / David Bushnell - When Sherman leaves a mess in the Penthouse, he and Peabody find a mouse and must catch it before it completely wrecks the show

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep6
programme.desc: Dragon Quest / Opposite Day - Dragon Quest The unlucky staff of a medieval-themed restaurant in Deedstown, get an unfriendly visit from Professor Thurdigree Burns. Opposite Day When Wolfie's experiment with moonlight goes awry, everyone but Casper turns into his or her opposite.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Jigsaw Puzzle Pieces - When some pieces from Big Ears' jigsaw puzzle go missing, Noddy investigates: where are the missing pieces? He soon realises someone must have taken them and draws up a list of suspects. Having discounted the Pirates and then the Naughticorns, Noddy is baffled. But when Pat-Pat and the Pockets invite him to share a piece of toy cake, Noddy suddenly has a breakthrough: maybe it wasn't one toy who took lots of pieces but lots of toys who each took one piece. Cloppycorn, Deltoid, Smartysaurus and Carlton all admit they took one piece. They didn't think they were doing any harm! Big Ears gets all the missing pieces back and everyone is at last able to enjoy his jigsaw puzzle of Toyland. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep84
programme.desc: Pip's Pony - Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep32
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Whistle Worries - Raa Raa is determined that he can copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just can't whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep33
programme.desc: Happy Pawtomotiversary / Winner, Winner, Lasagna Dinner - Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaw's Pawtomotive Garage! As a surprise, Tag and Paw decide to track down items to recreate the garage to look like it did when it first opened while the rest of the family distract the Grandpawrents. / Tag and Wind face off in the Lasagna Games for a chance to be Sams new Crew Chief. A series of lasagna-themed games will challenge their speed, fix-it skills, and leadership. But there can only be one winner.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep7
programme.desc: Moms Birthday / Angry - Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruzs help to perform a dance for Moms birthday. Though its hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep15
programme.desc: Qilin-mania - Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yis building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isnt an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS Ep12
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 1 - Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to DAngelo and Alex.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep23
programme.desc: Wheres The Party? / The Noisiest Night - When Marcus loses an invitation to a birthday party and doesnt know where it will take place, the Dew Drops set out to find the location and get Marcus to the party on time. / When Harper cant sleep because of a strange noise in her room, the Dews must figure out the source.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep24
programme.desc: Escape The Backpack / Play Date - While helping Lola pack for her first day of camp, the Dews get stuck inside her backpack! Using the random items inside, the Dews get crafty in their attempt to break out. / When Eden and Phoebe join Harper and Marcus for a playdate, the Dews disagree on what activity their kids should do, ultimately learning that there are lots of ways to play!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep23
programme.desc: Spark Bees / Best in Show - The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep24
programme.desc: Superfan / Barb - Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep49
programme.desc: Lucky and the Girl Who Cried Wolf - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep50
programme.desc: Lucky and the Endless Possibilities - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep25
programme.desc: The Pawston Chewbilee / Dont Go, Cat. Go! - Based on PD Eastman's classic childrens book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scoochs easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tags high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, shes often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep25
programme.desc: Memory Spark / Wondertusk - Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep13
programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep14
programme.desc: Yi's LiLi-est Fan - While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old whos positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crews pursuits. When Everest doesnt return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLis intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep15
programme.desc: Qilin-mania - Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yis building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isnt an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.desc: Planet Wobble - Messy and friends rocket into space, but a mischievous Messy sends OKIDO's seasons into chaos! Time to fix this planet wobble.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Tower Bridge, London - Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Yoga Ball - Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby European Pond Turtle - In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Mission: Ringy Thing - Rayane takes a starring role in the big drama club play, with Diesel right by his side.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Aye Aye and Prevost's Squirrel - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet an aye aye. They see how this night-loving lemur has one extraordinarily long finger, that it uses to tap on tree branches to find hollows full of bugs. Next Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet some Prevost's squirrels.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep14
programme.desc: The Big Book of Pirate World Records - Captain Captain wants to get Sandy, Seaweed and herself into the Big Book of Pirate World Records and sets the pirates the task of trying to break a record to get their names in the book!

programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.desc: Bioluminescent Bay, Puerto Rico - Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Under the power S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lu Yi, a cold and elite officer of the Ming Dynastys secret police, the Jinyiwei, crosses paths with Yuan Jin Xia, a sharp and tomboyish officer from the Police's 6th Division. Initially clashing over cases, theyre forced to work together when assigned to investigate missing river repair funds. As they unravel a conspiracy involving high-ranking officials, their mutual animosity gradually transforms into friendship and love.

programme.title: Under the power S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Lu Yi, a cold and elite officer of the Ming Dynastys secret police, the Jinyiwei, crosses paths with Yuan Jin Xia, a sharp and tomboyish officer from the Police's 6th Division. programme.title: Infinity and Beyond S1 Ep20
programme.desc: In 2022, to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to China, Mango TV and TVB decided to produce a music program. There are 16 singers from either Hong Kong or China who love Hong Kong's music/cantopop. The 16 singers are separated into two teams: men and women team.

programme.title: Fall In Love Again S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lawyer Mu Qian and mediator Ou Yang decide to divorce due to a lack of trust and understanding, but are given a 30-day cooling-off period. As they continue to cross paths at work and handle other couples' divorce cases, they begin to reflect on their own relationship and mistakes. With time running out, they must decide whether they can resolve their issues and rekindle their love.
